bibl.title: Observations on Early Papyri of the Synoptic Gospels, especially on the "Scribal Habits".
bibl.note: From a survey of the early papyri it appears that omission is the more common scribal habit. The rule lectio brevior potior is not at once to be accepted.
HEAD Peter M., Observations on Early Papyri of the Synoptic Gospels, especially on the "Scribal Habits".
